propbrowse.title: Wikidata Propbrowse
propbrowse.description: Browse and view all properties on Wikidata

exturl.title: External URL stats
exturl.description: A better External links search. Collates all the links so you can view which Wikipedia pages have the most external links to a pattern.

sum.title: Sum of all Knowledge
sum.description: A project to visualize the knowledge getting added to Wikidata, Wikipedia and Wikimedia Commons.

wdtranslate.title: Wikidata Translate
wdtranslate.description: Use the power of Wikidata to translate a term between two or more languages.

langviews.title: Multilingual page views
langviews.description: Page views for an article in all available languages using the data from stats.grok.se. This shows you the last 30 days.

wdskim.title: Wikidata Skim
wdskim.description: A (very) limited, visual, replacement for Wikidata Query which just does one claim, based on the 'linkshere' method of the Wikidata API.

chantek.title: Chantek
chantek.description: An unaspiring HTTP API server written in Python with lots of Wikimedia-related commands.

gwtcook.title: GWT Cook
gwtcook.description: Preprocess and transform XML from select API's for ingestion in the GLAMWiki Toolset.
gwtcook.name: hay-gwtcook

wdd.title: Wikimedia Documentation Directory
wdd.description: A way to easily discover Wikimedia-related documentation including all outreach activities e.g GLAM and education. For metrics and other tools please visit the Tools Directory.
wdd.name: hay-wdd

wdview.title: Wikidata View
wdview.description: A simple Reasonator-like viewer for Wikidata items using the simplified Wikidata Readyonly API.

reccat.title: Recent acquisitions
reccat.description: Show the newest pages in a category

gtaa.title: GTAA Reasonator
gtaa.description: The Reasonator is an awesome tool for viewing Wikidata items. This tool tries to provide the same view for items in the GTAA.

kbpermalink.title: Pica Permalink
kbpermalink.description: A small Javascript bookmarklet to generate a permalink to library catalogues that use the OCLC PICA software.

nadownload.title: NA Download
nadownload.description: A small tool to download all images from a Dutch National Archive inventory.

nasearch.title: NA Search
nasearch.description: A tool to do a mass search in the Dutch National Archive photo collection

streetwiki.title: Streetwiki
streetwiki.description: View Wikipedia articles in Google Maps & Street View.

sgdtransform.title: SGD Transform
sgdtransform.description: Add a source URL to XML files provided by the Staten Generaal Digitaal API.
